name: draw_raster
description: Draw a raster of pixels by setting individual (x, y) coordinates to specific colors in a single batched action.

canvas_id.description: The canvas where the raster pixels will be drawn.

pixels.description: List of pixels to draw, each defined by x, y, and color.

color.description: Color of the pixel, in hex (e.g. '#ff0000') or rgba format.
